document_data.mainbody:
Sarangos was a jewelry shop in Athkatlas rich Gem District in the 14 century DR.
Sarangos shop was located on the northern side of Sarbronts Walk, in a chaotic and clustered easterly Gem District. Across the street from Sarangos stood merchant Darastiir Thalongals abode.
By the late 14 century DR, Sarangos, along with a dozen other expensive jewelry stores "made Gem District glitter."
